name: Super Duper Sumos
description: Super Duper Sumos is an American animated series that is produced by DiC Entertainment. It was created by Kevin O'Donnell and Vincent Nguyen. It was aired from 2002 to 2003 on Nickelodeon in the United States. Super Duper Sumos later reran on This TV from September 27, 2011 to September 30, 2012.
